Name: TrumPiñata
About the game: Trumpiñata is a political piñata experience you won't want to miss. Use a baseball bat to rip him apart! Key Features: - Cathartic - Hit him in his smug face - His limbs come off - Get some exercise! Audio is an important part of this game, so make sure your sound is turned on!
